Key Match Events: Coby White narrowly missed his first career triple-double, finishing with 23 points, 10 rebounds and nine assists
Torrey Craig scored 18 with five 3-pointers after halftime
Nikola Vucevic added 16 points and 13 rebounds for the Bulls
Miles Bridges had 31 points, 12 rebounds and eight assists for the Hornets
Bridges connected on a leaning 3-pointer with 2 seconds left to send the game into OT
Patrick Williams knocked down a corner 3 off an assist from Lonzo Ball with 49 seconds left in overtime to push the Chicago lead to seven
Pre-Game Insights: LaMelo Ball has now missed 116 of Charlotte's last 196 games over the past three seasons
Zach LaVine (toe soreness) and Ayo Dosunmu (soleus strain) were out for Chicago
LaMelo Ball missed the game due to wrist soreness
Brandon Miller (sprained ankle) also sat for the Hornets
Post-Match Reflections: Bulls: Craig didn't play in the first half, but was a huge spark after the break
Hornets: Guard Tre Mann will miss at least another two weeks with disc irritation
